meanings.definition: The quality or state of being weak or timid
meanings.sent1: Her wimpishness was evident when she refused to stand up for herself.
meanings.sent2: His wimpishness showed when he avoided confrontations at all costs.
meanings.sent3: Despite his wimpishness, he managed to muster the courage to speak up in the meeting.
meanings.sent4: The wimpishness of the kitten made it vulnerable to the bigger cats in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent5: The wimpishness of the character made him a target for bullies in the story.

meanings.definition: Behavior or attitude characterized by lack of courage or determination
meanings.sent1: The team's wimpishness led to their defeat in the final match.
meanings.sent2: She overcame her wimpishness and took on the challenging task with determination.
meanings.sent3: His wimpishness in the face of danger often resulted in comical situations.
meanings.sent4: The wimpishness of the politician cost him the support of his constituents.
meanings.sent5: The wimpishness of the hero made the audience root for the underdog instead.
